original: uttariṁ nūna passati”.🔽“Nāyaṁ dhammaṁ adhammaṁ vā,
analyzed: uttarim nūna passati  na ayam dhammam adhammam vā
translated: and sees what’s beyond.”🔽“He doesn’t know what’s lawful or unlawful,

analyzed: na ayam jānāti kiñcana anti 🔽pādañjalījātakam sattama
translated: he doesn’t know anything at all.”🔽The Foot-Washing Jātaka (No. 7)
